original_title: Stretch of Colombo - Badulla main road blocked by rockfalls
original_body_lines: The Colombo - Badulla main road has been blocked after rockfalls were reported in Haldummulla area around 7:15 p.m. today (Jan.02).
According to Ada Derana correspondent, vehicular movement along the stretch of the road remains obstructed by the rockfalls.
